title: AI's impact could worsen gaps between world's rich and poor, a UN report says
description: A new report by the United Nations Development Program is urging governments to focus more on how artificial intelligence technologies might affect people
content:
A new report by the United Nations Development Program is urging governments to focus more on how artificial intelligence technologies might affect people already disadvantaged in a data-driven world

title: AI may discriminate against you at work. Some states are making it illegal.
description: New regulations aim to prevent discrimination from artificial intelligence and automated systems as they relate to employment.
content:
Derek Mobley applied for at least 80 jobs over several years but was rejected every time.
A Black worker over the age of 40, he says he has anxiety and depression and knows the main reason he wasn’t hired: Employers used Workday software. The allegat... [7354 chars]

title: Japanese companies' pretax profits rise 19% in July-September
description: Pretax profits at Japanese companies in the July-September period rose 19.7 percent from a year earlier to 27.54 trillion yen, marking a fourth straight quarterly increase, driven by strong demand in the field of artificial intelligence, the Finance Ministry said Monday. title: TRD Network Announces Presale Stage 1 and Introduces Its AI-Enhanced DePIN Infrastructure Initiative
description: New York, USA, Dec. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- TRD Network today announced the upcoming launch of Presale Stage 1 and shared new information about its AI-enhanced Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Network (DePIN), developed to support more adaptive and resilient decentralized systems. This milestone marks the definitive moment for investors to acquire tokens in an ecosystem built to merge the efficiency of Artificial Intelligence with the security and resilience of decentralized physical resources.

title: OpenAI buys stake in Thrive Holdings to push AI into accounting, IT services
description: ChatGPT-maker OpenAI has taken a stake in private equity firm Thrive Holdings as part of a partnership to embed artificial intelligence into traditional industries such as accounting and IT services,...
content:
Dec 1 (Reuters) - ChatGPT-maker OpenAI has taken a stake in private equity firm Thrive Holdings as part of a partnership to embed artificial intelligence into traditional industries such as accounting and IT services, the companies said on Monday.
